Container.Name: HugoMods
Container.Overview: Build and deploy Hugo static websites on Unraid. Automatically clones your Git repository, installs dependencies, and builds your Hugo site. Perfect for generating static sites for blogs, documentation, landing pages, and more with Hugo's blazing-fast static site generation. Features persistent storage for source code and node_modules, automatic dependency management, and support for custom Hugo configurations. Simply provide your Git repository URL and the site will be built in the /src/public directory.

Config.Name: Git Repository URL
Config.Description: Public git repository containing your Hugo website (required).

Config.Name: Base URL
Config.Description: Base URL for Hugo site (used in build). Example: / or /mysite/

Config.Name: Website Source Code
Config.Description: Persistent Hugo source directory. Repo is cloned here on first start.

Config.Name: Hugo Config Directory
Config.Description: Hugo configuration directory. Create config/_default/hugo.toml to override settings. See https://gohugo.io/configuration/introduction/#configuration-directory

Config.Name: node_modules Cache
Config.Description: Persist node_modules to avoid reinstalling on every restart.
